item.title: The Hard Way
item.description:
The Hard Way

The hard way is often the most rewarding.

item.title: The 3 Most Harmful Addictions (Hint: 2 probably apply to you) - Part 1
item.description:
The 3 Most Harmful Addictions (Hint: 2 probably apply to you) - Part 1

You are addicted and probably don't even realize it. I didn't until I started feeling the incredible clarity as well as the withdrawal symptoms of getting off the most subtle of the 3. "The three most harmful addictions are heroin, carbohydrates, and amonthly salary." ― Nassim Nicholas Taleb. 1.

item.title: Cruel Jokes - Rules and Lessons for April 1st
item.description:
Cruel Jokes - Rules and Lessons for April 1st

I'll never forget the April 1st where it seemed a very cruel joke been played on me. Lots of hard work had led to a huge breakthrough on a new program we were launching, but through various circumstances the storm clouds began looming over our parade.

item.title: The Value of Time
item.description:
The Value of Time

Lately I've been thinking a lot about the value of time. One of the psalmists of ancient Israel prays that God would "teach us to number our days". Regardless of your world-view, the practice of numbering your days - for me today is 16,256 - can be a very powerful and humbling thing.

item.title: One Day
item.description:
One Day

Days can change you forever. This was the evening of one such day in November 2012.
